pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.5: According to the commentary, this seems to mean that the food should not protrude beyond the rim of the bowl. Sp 4.892: Thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha thūpīkato nāma pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ atikkamitvā kato, “Thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa: here thūpīkata means having gone beyond the inner rim of the bowl.”
